title: Being serious I am actually super depressed I dont have a boyfriend yet.
body:
I mean it. 

I don't get why people IRL don't love me.

I am cute, really, and I know it.
I am smart. I am funny I am successful.
I have a bunch of great friends.
I have a huge eee number of cultural capital topics I know

...yet I can't get a fucking boyfriend...

I have cried for like everyday the past 6 months about it. Idk why I don't have a boyfriend.

Srsly thou. Fuck my life.
